mapper.insert: insert into payment(pa_price, pa_start, pa_end, pa_state, pa_me_id, pa_pt_num) values(#{pt.pt_price}, #{pa.pa_start}, #{end}, #{pa.pa_state}, #{me.me_id}, #{pt.pt_num});

insert into payment_history (ph_imp_uid, ph_merchant_uid, ph_amount, ph_status, ph_paid_at, ph_card_name, ph_card_number, ph_card_quota, ph_pt_num, ph_me_id) values(#{ph.ph_imp_uid}, #{ph.ph_merchant_uid}, #{ph.ph_amount}, #{ph.ph_status}, #{ph.ph_paid_at}, #{ph.ph_card_name}, #{ph.ph_card_number}, #{ph.ph_card_quota}, #{pt.pt_num}, #{me.me_id})
mapper.select: SELECT pa.* FROM payment pa JOIN payment_type pt ON pa.pa_pt_num = pt.pt_num WHERE pa.pa_me_id = #{me_id} ORDER BY pa.pa_start DESC LIMIT 1
